text: The Mercedes-Benz G-Class is a mid-size luxury SUV produced by Mercedes-Benz. == W460 (1979–1991) == The first generation G-Class (W460) was made from 1979 to 1991 by Mercedes-Benz. == W461 (1992–2022) == The second generation G-Class (W461) was made from 1992 to 2022 by Mercedes-Benz. == W463 (1990–2018) == The third generation G-Class (W463) was made from 1990 to 2018 by Mercedes-Benz. == W463 (2018–2024) == The fourth generation G-Class (W463) was made from 2018 to 2024 by Mercedes-Benz. ==Gallery== Image:Mercedes Benz G 2018 at Legendy 2018 in Prague.jpg|G 500 ==Other websites== * Category:1980s automobiles Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles G-Class Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Mercedes-Benz G-Class
